title: Special Transport services for Poson
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Chief Operating Officer of the Ceylon Transport Board (CTB) said that despite the fuel crisis, the CTB has decided to implement a special transport service on Tuesday (14) for Poson Poya.
Meanwhile, Deputy General Manager of Railways Gamini Seneviratne said that special train services are in operation for Poson Poya.
